game.name: Wall World 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 신비로운 장벽의 세계에서 펼쳐지는 놀라운 모험이 계속됩니다. 로보스파이더를 타고 장벽 안으로 들어가 유물과 기술을 찾고, 엑소슈트와 스파이더를 업그레이드하고, 깊은 곳의 괴물들과 싸우고, 사건의 진상에 도달하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The adventure in the mysterious world of the Wall continues! Pilot your robospider into its depths, uncover lost artifacts and technologies, upgrade your exosuit and spider, and battle the horrors lurking in the dark. Unravel the mysteries buried in the depths of the Wall!

reviewHighlights.text: icba playing this game. Its just a downgrade and nothing really new. Artifact drops are gutted or what? i have seen a weapon in it only once in 4 hour...
Okay, I really tried to give this game some love, like I did the first opus. But no. That's not possible. That's a slog of a grind, doing quick missio...
